summary: Request to ensure only a single version of @temporalio/workflow is loaded into the workflow runtime. Multiple library versions cause failures because workflow state is stored in module static variables.
userImpact: Users with libraries depending on different versions of @temporalio/workflow encounter runtime failures due to incompatible state management.
rootCause: Workflow state is stored in module static variables, making it incompatible with multiple versions loaded simultaneously
keyQuote: We've seen cases where a library depends on a different version of our runtime which is not supported because we store workflow state in a module static variable.
